programme.title: The Longest Wave
programme.desc: THE LONGEST WAVE offers a rare glimpse into what motivates an athlete who has everything to lose to push his body and mind to the limit. A film about surf legend Robby Naish.

programme.title: Whistle of Wilderness
programme.desc: Whistle of Wilderness follows a young islander's journey through nature, mind, and life.

programme.title: Lady Killers
programme.desc: Lady Killers follows top female surfers risking it all, featuring Moore, Marks, and Simmers in 4K action.

programme.title: Trouble: The Lisa Andersen Story
programme.desc: Lisa Andersen is one of surfings few transcendent stars. 4x world champ and inductee into the Surfer Hall of Fame, she is a true surf icon. But this is not a story about surfing. Its the story of a woman brave enough to be vulnerable.

programme.title: White Rhino
programme.desc: One photographer's journey to capture the wave of a lifetime. In pursuit, 3 epic swells hit the South Pacific shorelines, providing conditions only madmen could dream of.

programme.title: Unsurfed Afghanistan
programme.desc: Unsurfed Afghanistan follows Afridun's journey to find waves in his homeland, across three continents.

programme.title: Not By Chance
programme.sub-title: The Ugly Duckling with Simon Jones & Torren Martyn
programme.desc: Torren Martyn and Simon Jones craft Calypte, a board born from adventure and a decade-long bond.

programme.title: All Tha Way Live
programme.desc: From beaches to streets, All Tha Way Live takes you on a journey with some of the planet's best surfers.

programme.title: Ind Ho Nesia
programme.desc: IND HO NESIA is a taste of our 2024 journey. Mostly surfing, trying to find fun waves.

programme.title: To Be Frank
programme.desc: To Be Frank explores authenticity and community in surfing via Frank Paine, a 73-year-old South Bay icon.

programme.title: Beyond Normal
programme.desc: In this intimate portrayal of resilience and self-discovery, professional surfer Becca Speak battles to reclaim her identity and return to the waves after a devastating brain injury suffered during a competition.

programme.title: Between Fjords
programme.desc: Filip and Lukas Polach find purpose in Icelandâ€™s wild beauty, chasing slopes and icy waves.

programme.title: Surfing Morning of the Sun
programme.desc: Stunning contemporary surfing mixed with classic surfing from the 1970's. A inspirational homage to the classic surf films of the 1970's like Morning of the Earth. This is one the finest of its genre and noted for the original score.

programme.title: Not By Chance
programme.desc: Trevor Gordon builds a surfboard in 2 days, sails the Atlantic, and rides waves with it.

programme.title: Surprise Excitement Party
programme.desc: Transworld Surf presents Surprise Excitement Party. Starring Mark Healey, John Florence, Conner Coffin, Parker Coffin, Michel Bourez and many more.

programme.title: Ice Edge
programme.desc: Ice Edge follows surfers shaping ice boards, battling nature in a poetic tribute to Lofoten.

programme.title: The Arena: North Shore
programme.desc: Every winter on the North Shore of Oahu, the best surfers in the world come to charge the infamous Bonzai Pipeline to prove their worthiness. It is on the deadliest wave in the world where young surfer's careers are sprung into superstardom.

programme.title: The Essence of Surfing
programme.desc: The Essence of Surfing is a riveting surf documentary that gets to the heart of why surfing is the greatest sport in the world. Featuring surfers of all kinds, from the neighborhood grom to some of the greatest surfers to ever live, The Essence of Surfing uncovers what it is about this awesome sport that makes it a necessary part of each of their lives. Shot in the world's most beautiful locations by top notch Cinematographers Erik Ippel and Mike Prickett, this film is sure to hook and inspire anyone looking to get wet and catch some waves.

programme.title: The Longest Wave
programme.desc: THE LONGEST WAVE offers a rare glimpse into what motivates an athlete who has everything to lose to push his body and mind to the limit. A film about surf legend Robby Naish.

programme.title: Whistle of Wilderness
programme.desc: Whistle of Wilderness follows a young islander's journey through nature, mind, and life.

programme.title: Lady Killers
programme.desc: Lady Killers follows top female surfers risking it all, featuring Moore, Marks, and Simmers in 4K action.

programme.title: Trouble: The Lisa Andersen Story
programme.desc: Lisa Andersen is one of surfings few transcendent stars. 4x world champ and inductee into the Surfer Hall of Fame, she is a true surf icon. But this is not a story about surfing. Its the story of a woman brave enough to be vulnerable.

programme.title: Beyond the Green Veil
programme.desc: Beyond the Green Veil unveils how logging shapes access as surfers and skiers rethink conservation.

programme.title: Archy: Built for Speed, Born to Ride
programme.desc: Archys story is one of survival through surf stardom at an early age, fame, drugs, alcohol, sponsorships and the surf rock star lifestyle. Compelling interviews, and explosive surf action from the 80s, 90s, 2000s and beyond.

programme.title: Discovering Mavericks
programme.desc: This is the story of those who risked their lives, some paying the ultimate price, for the ultimate ride. Executive produced by Mavericks legend Jeff Clark and directed by Joshua Pomer. Winner of the Newport Beach Film Festival 2013 Audience Award.

programme.title: Cluster
programme.desc: This is our bookmark. Our full stop. It is an actual document of individuality and modern surfing and living and romping and laughing. Collect it and recollect on it. Here we are now, entertain us. And well take it from there.

programme.title: Fish: The Surfboard Documentary
programme.desc: Fish: the Surfboard Documentary, covers the impact the fish surfboard made on surf culture. A deep look at the origin and impact of the Fish Surfboard design and how it would influence surf culture 30 years later. - A look at what happens when a creative San Diego surfer invents a board with a brand-new shape, and the whole surfing world hops aboard for the ride. THE FISH SURFBOARD DESIGN was created by Steve Lis in the San Diego Cliffs area in 1967, and became HUGELY popular in the 1990's.
